feature.label: EMF Model Comparison for EUnit (EMF Compare 3.x / Kepler and after)
feature.description: This feature adds the modules required by EUnit to compare EMF-based models using EMF Compare 3.x. It is compatible with Eclipse Kepler and any other subsequent releases with EMF Compare 3.x.
